meanings.definition: Lumbricals: muscles in the hand that flex the fingers at the metacarpophalangeal joints and extend the fingers at the interphalangeal joints.
meanings.sent1: The lumbricals in the hand help with bending and straightening the fingers.
meanings.sent2: She felt a slight strain in her lumbricals after playing the piano for hours.
meanings.sent3: The lumbricals in the hand decided to take a break from all the finger exercises.
meanings.sent4: His lumbricals worked tirelessly, like tiny springs in his fingers.
meanings.sent5: The lumbricals, like little helpers, made finger movements easier.
